titleStmt.title: Diana The praises of his mistres, in certaine sweete sonnets. By H.C.
titleStmt.author: Constable, Henry, 1562-1613.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] C[harlewood] for Richard Smith: and are to be sold at the vvest doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" and headpieces; the last leaf is blank.
D3v (last page of text) has catchword "Blame", retained in error from skeleton forme of B1v. Covered with a cancel slip in CSmH copy.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
